name: Autoblog WPMagic
author: WPMagic

sections.description:
Autoblog WPMagic Plugin for WordPress makes it possible to automate the task of publishing blog posts.
The plugin searches for files in a specific folder and publishes content in a blog post.

Translations

  • English – default, always included

Tags

autoblog wordpress, auto blogging website, autoblogging plugin, wp robot autoblog plugin, wordpress autoblogging plugin, auto blogging news website, free autoblogging plugin for wordpress, best autoblogging plugin for wordpress, auto blog post wordpress plugin, best autoblogging plugin, wordpress autoblogging plugin free, auto blog plugin wordpress, wp autoblogging plugin, wordpress auto blog content generator
sections.installation:
• Install it from Plugin Menu -> Add new.
  • Upload your .txt files to the folder /wp-content/uploads/autoblog-wpm-free/.
  • Check a sample file that shows you how the .txt files should be formatted.
  • Wait for the file’s table to populate or manually populate the table with files in the “Settings”.
  • The plugin will publish periodically content from the files as blog posts on your website.

short_description: Autoblog WPMagis is a WordPress Plugin for automatically publishing posts from a specific folder.
